item.title: Random name picker. Rep ++ (Delta)
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

I am trying to write a command that says a random player name that is online, Only I dont know how to move on. At this point the command sends a message of all the players that are online on the server in sM’s to me.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pp") && (TargetName == "null") && (GotTarget == false)) { client noob = null; for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){ noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(noob.playerName != playerName){ TargetName = noob.playerName; sM("Your target is : "+TargetName+""); } } } }

Public’s

public String TargetName = "null"; public boolean GotTarget = false;

I want it that it choose a random name of all the people that are online and display it in the chatbox as a “sM”.
Thank you!
Youri Dudock.

Read full topic
